common.name: Name

password.label: Password
password.length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.special-character: Password must contain at least one special character

file.title: Select a file

common.consent: I agree to the terms and conditions

friend-request.ask: You received a friend request from

meta.title: Edit Profile – Colonizadar
meta.description: Update your username and profile picture easily on Colonizadar. Manage your personal information securely.
meta.keywords: edit profile, update username, change profile picture, user settings, Colonizadar

meta.title: Reset Password – Colonizadar
meta.description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link. The email field is prefilled if you are logged in.
meta.keywords: reset password, password recovery, forgot password, password reset email, Colonizadar

meta.title: Password Reset Confirmation – Colonizadar
meta.description: Confirm your password reset by clicking the link sent to your email. Securely update your password and regain access to your account.
meta.keywords: password reset confirmation, reset password, email verification, Colonizadar

meta.title: Welcome to Colonizadar – Online Strategy & Colonization Game
meta.description: In Colonizadar, lead your nation to global domination! Conquer new lands, battle natives, and outmaneuver rival players in this multiplayer colonization game.
meta.keywords: colonization game, online strategy game, multiplayer game, conquer the world, nation builder, Colonizadar

meta.title: Login – Colonizadar
meta.description: Log in to Colonizadar using your email and password, or quickly via Google, GitHub, or Discord OAuth.
meta.keywords: login, sign in, email login, password login, OAuth login, Google login, GitHub login, Discord login, Colonizadar

meta.title: Create Your Account – Colonizadar
meta.description: Sign up for Colonizadar by creating your account with username, email, and password. Or quickly register using Google, Discord, or GitHub.
meta.keywords: create account, sign up, register, username, email, password, OAuth, Google login, Discord login, GitHub login, Colonizadar

meta.title: Account Confirmation – Welcome to Colonizadar
meta.description: Confirm your account creation by clicking the link sent to your email. Get started with Colonizadar today.
meta.keywords: account confirmation, email verification, create account, Colonizadar

meta.title: OAuth Callback – Colonizadar
meta.description: Processing OAuth callback to authenticate and retrieve user profile. Securely handling access token before redirecting you.
meta.keywords: OAuth callback, access token, user authentication, bearer token, Colonizadar

meta.title: Confirm Logout – Colonizadar
meta.description: Are you sure you want to log out? Confirm your logout to end your session safely on Colonizadar.
meta.keywords: confirm logout, logout confirmation, end session, Colonizadar

modal.title: Logout
modal.text: Are you sure you want to logout ?

forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.subtitle: You have to be logged to access this app's part.

meta.title: Access Forbidden – Colonizadar
meta.description: You do not have permission to access this page. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.
meta.keywords: access forbidden, 403 error, permission denied, restricted access, Colonizadar

meta.title: Page Not Found – Colonizadar
meta.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Check the URL or return to the homepage of Colonizadar.
meta.keywords: 404 error, page not found, missing page, Colonizadar

meta.title: Already Logged In – Return to Your Dashboard | Colonizadar
meta.description: You're already logged in to Colonizadar. Continue to your dashboard or return to the homepage to explore more features.
meta.keywords: already logged in, user session, dashboard, homepage, Colonizadar

meta.title: Social Hub – Colonizadar
meta.description: Access your social dashboard: manage your friends, blocked users, and profile settings from one place.
meta.keywords: social hub, manage friends, blocked users, user profile, Colonizadar

meta.title: Manage Your Friends – Colonizadar
meta.description: Add, remove, accept friend requests, and block users easily with Colonizadar. Manage your social connections seamlessly.
meta.keywords: manage friends, add friends, remove friends, friend requests, block users, social management, Colonizadar

modal.title: Remove a friend
modal.text: will be removed from your friends

meta.title: Blocked Users - Manage Your Block List | Colonizadar
meta.description: Easily view and manage the users you've blocked on Colonizadar. Take control of your social connections and ensure a safer experience.
meta.keywords: blocked users, block list, manage blocked users, social settings, privacy control, Colonizadar

meta.title: Manage Notifications – Colonizadar
meta.description: View, accept, decline, and delete your notifications, including friend requests, easily with Colonizadar.
meta.keywords: notifications, manage notifications, friend requests, accept notifications, decline notifications, delete notifications, Colonizadar

play.title: Play
play.description: Play alone or with your friends

meta.title: Play – Join or Create a Room | Colonizadar
meta.description: Join an existing room with a token or password, or create your own room to start playing on Colonizadar. Quick and easy access to your game sessions.
meta.keywords: join room, create room, room access, private room, token login, game session, Colonizadar

meta.title: Room Setup – Prepare Your Game | Colonizadar
meta.description: Configure your game before it starts. Wait for players to join or add bots if needed. Manage your room settings easily with Colonizadar.
meta.keywords: room setup, game lobby, wait for players, add bots, game configuration, multiplayer room, Colonizadar

meta.title: Game in Progress – Colonizadar
meta.description: Play Colonizadar in real-time! Manage your empire, strategize with or against others, and conquer the map in this multiplayer experience.
meta.keywords: gameplay, online game, Colonizadar game, multiplayer strategy, empire building, real-time game

players-left.title: Some players have left the game
players-left.description: If one of those players does not return before the end of its countdown, the game will be over.
